lead_paragraph: Lawmakers moved to prohibit Texas cities from banning hydraulic fracturing and other drilling activities within their boundaries, a major victory for industry groups and top conservatives.

headline.print_headline: Texas: Bill Stops Cities From Banning Fracking
headline.main: Texas: Bill Stops Cities From Banning Fracking

snippet: Lawmakers moved to prohibit Texas cities from banning hydraulic fracturing and other drilling activities within their boundaries, a major victory for industry groups and top conservatives.
